participant_1.background:
I sometimes get distracted by my phone when I'm trying to work.
I have a Windows computer because it is compatible with my third-party PDF reader.
I like to drink sweet tea because it reminds me of the summers I spent mowing lawns.
i am obsessed with animals.
I work out at home so I can listen to my favorite music while I get in shape.

participant_2.background:
I'm sad that my laptop's battery is faulty.
i play guitar on my free time.
i m a drummer in an indie band.
i work at a coffee shop.
I'm a night owl, but my cat wakes me up every morning.

content.text: Hello! I'm a Windows user because my third-party PDF reader is compatible with it. What operating system do you use?
Hi! I'm a Mac user, but my laptop's battery is faulty and I'm sad about it.
Ah, that's too bad. I've always wanted to try a Mac, but I'm too used to Windows.
It's definitely an experience, but I don't think I could ever go back to Windows.
Well, if you're ever looking for someone to fix your laptop, I'm your guy!
Thanks! I'll keep that in mind. What do you do for a living?
Oh, cool! What kind of software do you work on?
I mostly work on web applications. What do you do for a living?
I'm a drummer in an indie band, and I also work at a coffee shop.
That's awesome! I love music. What kind of music does your band play?
We play a mix of indie rock and alternative rock.
That sounds cool. I'd love to hear you guys play sometime.
We're always playing shows, so keep an eye out!
